p.k: This drama is about the mothers and daughters of today and will bring comfort and support to all the families in the world through the story of a love-hate relationship between a mother and her daughters created by the harsh realities of life.It is not a drama that aims to sentimentalize realities but rather shows how the way a mother and a daughter relate to each other inside and outside of the household has changed from the past and how mothers are struggling to be always on our side.
